Key Match Events: Lakers opened the preseason with a 124-107 loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves
Post-Match Reflections: J.J. Redick praised Bronny James as a'really disruptive defender'
Bronny James credited J.J. Redick for pushing him to develop defensively
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bronny James' first preseason game was a 'full-circle moment' as he will face the Phoenix Suns, a team he had workouts with before the draft
Others: Betting odds for the game: 79% bets for SAS, 21% for LAL
